title: First tutorial
text:
The first tutorial of the hydrological risk class.

Import the modules after having installed them with pip install

import rasterio

CONTROL STATEMENT
If statement: executes the cunk of code, if the condition holds true while loop: executes as long as the condition remains true for loop: iterates over the items of any sequence (a list or a string), in the order that they appear in the sequence.

#<!-- #| code-fold: true -->

heights = [1.80,1.75,1.89,1.90,1.55,1.77]

height_threshold = 1.75

for h in heights:

  if h >= height_threshold:

    print("Higher than threshold", h)
